posts.html:
@BelloAbril

Your opponent had it correct, when you use Scapeshift all the mountains enter the battlefield at the same time and then the Valakut triggers. since Valakut triggers whenever a mountain comes into play it triggers for each mountain and when valakut checks to see if there are enough mountains in play it sees all six each time it checks doing a total of 18 damage.

Ben Stark was the first person to really play this combo, he played it at Worlds in Rome. It works.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Srqt (1/7/2010 6:37:32 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@ RafiqTheMiststalker
  
   
I always figured that if you got multiples of a card like that, it either got more powerful or you just formed a mana bond with the other side of the mountain...for example, flavor wise, if I have two Howling Mines, I just figure in my mind that I just discovered more treasure in the first one
  
   
BTW, if you have four mountaains and put two mountains into play at the same time, they bot trigger for 3 damage each. They both enter play at the same time, therefore see eachother and trigger. Don't believe me, just hit up MTGO, I play a Valakut deck on there.

Posted By: NoobOfLore (8/6/2011 2:43:27 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: @BelloAbril: That combo works. The lands enter play simultaneously for Scapeshift, meaning that as they enter all at once, Valakut sets up a trigger for each since the 6+ mountains enter simultaneously so when Valakut checks, there are in fact 5 other mountains for each. Once Scapeshift resolves, Valakut's triggers all check to see if there are still 5 other mountains for each, if there are, Valakut deals 3 to a target for each trigger that successfully resolved.
posts.html:
@BelloAbril: That combo works. The lands enter play simultaneously for Scapeshift, meaning that as they enter all at once, Valakut sets up a trigger for each since the 6+ mountains enter simultaneously so when Valakut checks, there are in fact 5 other mountains for each. Once Scapeshift resolves, Valakut's triggers all check to see if there are still 5 other mountains for each, if there are, Valakut deals 3 to a target for each trigger that successfully resolved.

Posted By: Ratoly (1/28/2010 9:35:06 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Harrow/Khalni heart/rampant growth/fetch lands and expedition maps get this combo really rocking. plus all the mana accel allows you a land advantage.  
  
You can easily turn 2 khalni heart, play a land turn 3, play harrow, and gain 3 lands at the cost of 1. Cascade from bloodbraids will (if you are lucky) roll into a harrow or rampant growth, or a lightning bolt. Rock excellent burns like Lightning bolt, searing blaze, comet storm (the ramp really works nice with that).  
  
4 Siege gangs of course, lots of blocking/burn power. This deck works really well.
posts.html:
